name: TokenVesting
description: Select Token Vesting smart contract. WARNING! Released Tokens - all tokens allowed to CLAIM. Claimed tokens - all tokens already transferred to address account from vesting contract. Contract for distribute bought SELECT tokens.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when token fees are withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: TokensClaimed
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when token fees are withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: claimTokens
functionDecorators.description: Transfer released ERC-20 tokens to caller's address. Emits {TokensClaimed} event on success.

functionDecorators.name: getAddressVestingInfo
functionDecorators.description: Returns information about current account vesting state. To get actual tokensToClaim you need to do operation: {tokensToRelease} - {withdrawnTokensAmount}.

returnDecorators.name: releasedTokens
returnDecorators.description: - sum of all tokens allowed to be released (already claimed founds included).

returnDecorators.name: salesStageBalance
returnDecorators.description: - all bought and earned tokens during sale stages.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateVestingUsers
functionDecorators.description: Update vesting users - for fixing porpoises. Warning! If you pass existing user his values can be reset.

parameterDecorators.name: vestingUsers
parameterDecorators.description: - list of users who bought the tokens.
